Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if you need to act on all the vessels, then it is necessary either to remove the testicles or for the testicles to be affected by this, so that they are deprived of all nourishment due to the incision of the vessels, and become atrophied, or for them to be treated in such a way that they do not receive any benefit from this.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter LXV.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to a section that occurs in the cleft extended over the abdomen near the edges of the abdominal wall, so that parts of the bowels protrude through that rupture.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either of the ciphac or of dislocation of the joint, and it happens in these two species for various causes: by blow, by jump, by shout, by lifting some heavy thing, by similar circumstances.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of this, when it is by extension of the ciphac, is that it happens little by little over a long time, and does not happen suddenly, and it forms an abscess equal within as between the flesh because the ciphac compresses the bowel.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of it is when it is by section of the ciphac, for at the beginning it causes sudden violent pain; and it forms an abscess different in appearance from the usual one near the joint, and this is because of the displacement of the bowel, and the mass of it is towards the parts outside the ciphac.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes the membrane is pushed out with the bowel, and this type of hernia is called intestinal zirbal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it is due to gas, and sometimes the bowel enters through a fissure and remains there, causing great pain to the patient, and at times it leads to severe pain, especially when pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of the types of this illness with iron there is fear, for it must be avoided that any contact with that occurs.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the method of the operation for this condition is that you instruct the patient to push back the bowel with his hand to the parts inside his abdomen if it obeys its return, and then place him lying on his back between your hands, and lift the affected area.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then join the wound where you cut the scrotum above the testicles, and incise the scrotum completely along its length; and then insert hooks into both sides of the section as it seems necessary to open the section with them.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if you make the section according to the amount that it is possible for that part to heal from.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then remove the reddish skin that covers the scrotum until the white hard skin of each part is exposed.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Now insert your finger into the cut around the testicle, between the white skin that covers the scrotum and the underlying skin, and release any adhesions that are behind the testicle.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then pull apart the wound of the scrotum towards the sides, and with this stretch the white skin upwards with your left hand, and lift the testicle with the skin to the area of the incision; and instruct an assistant to raise it above while you dissolve any adhesions behind completely.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And feel with your fingers to ensure that there is no cause for the bowel being wrapped in the white hard skin.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause for concern, then place that back into the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then take a needle with a thick thread made of silk, and insert it at the end of the skin that is below the wound where you cut the scrotum; and then make incisions in the parts that protrude, until there are four threads, and then tie them together in the shape of a cross; and bind those threads to the skin which we mentioned that covers the scrotum with a strong knot from both sides.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	Here are the extremities of the veins and tie them strongly with a ligature so that none of the vessels through which these may pass cannot transmit any cause from which an abscess might result.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And tie another ligature three fingers below the first; then between these two ligatures leave a piece of the cord which is above the scrotum, in size equal to that of a finger; and cut off all the rest in a rounded manner, and remove it.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then cut into the part below the scrotum in such a way that blood and pus flow out as we have recommended regarding what we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then apply wool soaked in oil to the wound and place it there; and tie on the ligature that we have recommended (and sometimes the white thread is cauterized, as mentioned regarding the cutting to prevent blood flow, for this happens at times) and leave the ligature on so that it does not fall off.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the operation is delayed, then hot water should be applied, and place it on that so that it does not fall off as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then treat the wound with the usual treatment for wounds until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter LXVI.
De hernia ventosa.	On Ventous Hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this type of hernia, it has not been seen that anyone has dared to treat it with surgery.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the earlier ones said that it should be treated as we have recommended for the hernia involving a vessel; which is to ligate the vessels near the section with ease; and then dry up in the appropriate place around the abscess caused by this, until the vessels fall off.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	Regarding the treatment of wounds as we have said, it enters that it be healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter LXVII.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	About the incision that is made in the hemorrhoids.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	In some cases, there is a rupture in the hemorrhoids as we have said, and examine the area.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And they do not assign to the genitals any cause for the bags on the genitals; and if they do assign one, it is rare; and it returns to this in all cases.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time is prolonged with this, there is an adjusted fissure in the rectum through which the bag descends into the rectum; and it happens that because of the extension of the rectum, which is near the hemorrhoids as we have said, the cause being that the rectum is stretched and thus becomes soft and swollen, and it needs to be examined.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment for this is with cautery as has been described in the preceding narrative.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And in some cases, it is treated with iron according to this method: the patient lies on their back between two chairs, and then the area of the rupture of the abscesses is dried by cutting across its width as needed.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then stretch the white rectum below the cord until it is revealed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the cautery and place it on the prominent area of the rectum, and press it against the front of the abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew the two prominent points on the edges of the rectum together with stitches.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	From this extract the extremity of the vein should be tied off, and you should not incise the circumference completely, nor extend the opening, nor any other such cause as I will make you know in the treatment of an intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And in the treatment of this condition with the treatment of wounds, when you incise the abscesses, clean that area and restore the wound until it is healed; for the circumference is contracted and the prominence of rupture is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is best in this place, for it is closer to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter LXVIII.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the cord of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	In many cases, the cord of the testicles is softened in some men because the flesh that lies within it is softened, and this requires careful attention.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Then it is necessary for the one who treats this condition to have the patient lie according to his side, and incise the entire cord that is softened over the natural cord; and then adjust two edges with suturing.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, remove the excess of the softened cord at three or four places and with a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then incise between the sutures; and afterward treat as you would for other wounds until it is healed and the abscesses subside.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter LXIX.
De castracio.	On Castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is forbidden, but it is read to me that I must remember it in this book; and the remembrance of it is not necessary except for two ways, one of which is so that when asked about it, the physician may know how to cure those who suffer from it; and the other way is that we have sometimes a need for castration in other animals for our use by them, such as horses, oxen, and pigs, and similar beasts.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore I say that castration is performed in two ways: either by excision or by cutting and division.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in the one that is performed by excision, the method of the operation is that we should bathe the animal in warm water until the testicles become soft and relaxed and hang down.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those [testicles] with your hand until they are softened and do not appear to be hurt by the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	But in castration performed by cutting and division, make sure you hold the animal and press the root of the testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then grasp the spermatic cords, and make an incision on each side so that two halves are separated.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then cut those parts after you have peeled each one away.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave any cause for infection on those parts, but make the incision subtle so that it is above the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of castration, which is performed by excision, is better because it leaves no cause from the testicles for the animal to desire copulation.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	Here is the translation:
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter LXX.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphrodism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphrodozia in men is recognized in two ways: the first occurs when there appears a space between the testicles where female characteristics are present, such as hair in that area.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes in those cases, urine is discharged from the area between the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	In women, it is recognized in this way: the part of the woman above the pubis appears as if there are two testicles of a man slightly below and forward, like the scrotum of a man, containing two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	The treatment is of three kinds: two for men and one for women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	It is necessary that you incise the tightened flesh to allow the discharge of the harmful substance, and then treat it as you would other illnesses.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second kind for men, where urine is discharged from the area between the testicles, there is no treatment or surgery for it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	On cutting and raising flesh due to causes in women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Cutting should be done lightly according to natural causes, ensuring it is done carefully and with proper regard; sometimes in women, it may need to be more extensive, like in men, so that it does not interfere during intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Then you should hold the excess flesh with your hand or with forceps and cut it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	In making an incision, especially at the root of the nail, so that there is no flow of blood.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And for the treatment of those wounds until they are healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Malignant flesh is the flesh that arises from the corruption within the mother before it fills out those parts outside according to the appearance of hair (and for this reason some first called this "tail disease"); therefore we should incise it just as we would incise a tendon, and treat it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter LXXII.
De curacio de alratica.	On the Treatment of Ingrown Toenails.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Ingrown toenail is when the nail of the woman has not pierced through, or the passage is too small.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it is either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	It is accidental due to a disease that has preceded it, and that condition is caused either by flesh that is not properly fitted or by thin or thick skin.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	And it occurs either at the root of the uterus, or on its sides, or in the upper part of it, or in the lower part, and it prohibits menstruation and conception and pregnancy, and rather lightly also menstrual periods.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the diagnosis of that condition is made by palpation with a speculum, if the obstruction is apparent; but if it is not apparent, then seek it using your fingers or with a probe.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to thin tissue and is located between the two lips, then you should cut it and disrupt that obstruction.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And you should apply plasters to both lips, and also place the fingers of both hands on them.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And the woman should lie on her back, with her thighs spread apart, and then stretch both lips forcefully until that subtle suture is broken and the obstruction is opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	And then take wool and soak it in oil and apply that to the area, and keep a man there for three days so that the cut site does not become consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the suture is thick and dense, now it is necessary for you to cut that with a lancet or with a myrtle leaf.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to flesh, now suspend that for one inch, and then incise it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And with you are the medicines that stop blood flow without bleeding, such as hystaceae, dragon's blood, and oak galls, mixed with egg white.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And then administer a lead tube that is wide so that the wound does not consolidate too quickly.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And keep that for several days and administer dry lint.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then treat it with the other method of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And sometimes accidents occur in the major formation of other tissues, and now it is necessary to incise according to this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if this is due to a chronic abscess, then with the chronic abscess that is in the main part, do not cause any opposition or hindrance with iron in any way.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter LXXIII.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the treatment of hemorrhoids and tumors that occur in the female genital area.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are an inflammation of the veins inside the anus, from which blood flows continuously; and when these hemorrhoids become old, they form thrombi.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And now I have described the types of these conditions and their symptoms, and I will also describe which of them can be treated and which cannot be treated.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore, I say that hemorrhoids and thrombi that occur internally and do not appear to the senses should not be treated with instruments.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those that occur at the opening of the anus and which can be felt by touch are those that can be treated.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And it is necessary that you place the woman in a comfortable position and then grasp those hemorrhoids with forceps or rough cloth, and cut them with scissors.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then powder should be applied to stop the bleeding from one of the hemostatic powders that do not cause irritation, such as acacia and similar substances.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then press the area with cold compresses for one hour, and afterwards apply it to cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the bleeding persists, then have the patient sit in a decoction of sumac and lemon rinds and pomegranate peels and similar substances.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take flour of barley and apply it with honey and sour grape juice to make a plaster on the affected area.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood is clotting, that is good; and otherwise, bring together both wound edges, and on the nipples make incisions.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then take lint and apply it with the juice of cilantro or the juice of coriander or the juice of hyssop mixed with wine to that area, and make it adhere to the place; and afterwards treat the place with ointments until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	For those who require it with rough handling, ensure that you apply what is at your disposal according to what I have said about it equally.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And treat it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter LXXIV.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	On the piercing of the uterus in accidental injury to the abdomen.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Various types of abscesses occur in the abdomen, such as boil, stone abscess, ulcerous abscess, matted abscess, scrotal abscess, hemorrhoids, and fistulas, and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already mentioned these illnesses and the types of them and the signs of them, and their treatments in detail.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And when I say in this treatise about abscesses that occur in the abdomen, it is regarding those abscesses that can be treated successfully, and if you want to know how the procedure is performed using tools.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Then you must consider whether the pain of the abscess at its beginning is sharp with percussion and phlegm and fever, and if it appears red and feels hot to the touch, then do not proceed with perforation, and treat it with what helps in maturation until the severity of the symptoms subsides.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	During the operation, place the woman on a chair that has two arms; and recline her on her side and arrange her legs at the part below the stomach, and spread out her thighs, and let her hands rest above her knees, and bind some of it with bandages as is appropriate.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	And then the midwife should follow from the right side and administer the instrument with which the opening of the birth canal is prepared, the form of which will be described in the relevant cases that will follow.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And when you want to administer this instrument, place it along the line of the opening of the birth canal of the woman, and what is inserted into the birth canal from the instrument should not exceed the length of the opening itself, and guide it carefully.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	If the instrument is longer than the opening of the birth canal, then place cushions over the tissue of the birth canal's opening to prevent any instrument from being inserted beyond that length.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And it is necessary to place the spiral that runs along the instrument on the lower side and for the practitioner to hold the instrument and rotate the spiral so that the opening of the birth canal is prepared.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when the protrusion appears and is touched with the hand and is loose and moist, then it is necessary to dry that part with a dry cloth.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the blood is evacuated, then it is necessary to place on the wound a cloth soaked in rose oil or green oil, which has some astringent properties; and place the poultice in the area around the opening of the birth canal.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	Place the dressing over the wound and apply a clean wool cloth submerged in water in which mallows have been boiled.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And it should be treated appropriately for two days until the moment comes when it is convenient to do so, until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And sometimes the wound and the swelling are washed with this so that it is cleansed with water and honey, and then with water in which rue or wormwood has been boiled, and then returned to treatment.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the swelling is deep in the wounded area, it is now necessary to prohibit treatment with iron, instead treating it as we have described in the division.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter LXXV.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach midwives how to properly treat pregnancies when there is an abnormal condition as shown in the figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	It is necessary that the midwife knows at the beginning the figure of normal childbirth by its signs, and it is when you see the woman strain at her lower parts and desire to smell the air, and she is illuminated by what is above her for childbirth, then you know that this birth is according to a natural figure, and it is the delivery over her head, and the second one either suspended or hanging from the navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Therefore, when you see those signs, it is necessary to compress the abdomen so that the fetus descends gently, for when it descends over its head, then the second one will descend, and they should be cleaned of those superfluities with proper cleansing.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu i, o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	He who lies in another position is unnatural and unsuitable, for when the patient is placed on his back, his head is positioned in front of him and his feet behind, or one hand or foot is placed under his head or pelvis, and he is easily converted onto his side, but this resembles the unsuitable positions.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	It is necessary for the midwife to be wise and subtle in all such matters, and to guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And showing all the figures of those things, and which organ is in those according to what it signifies by that and stands upon that.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the seed is placed on its side due to natural inclination, and it is vigorous in the woman but difficult at the part, and sometimes the virtue of it has already been weakened, then use that practice, or let women have it, and evaporate the essence with fenugreek juice and aromatic oils.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then the midwife should insert her little finger and split it with the second one, or dry it with her fingernail until the moisture within it runs out.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press the woman's abdomen so that the fetus descends.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not descend, then it is necessary to cleanse the woman with meal of feathers and meal of fenugreek mixed together.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And then command him, after the cleansing, to be sneezed upon with certain conditions; and at his mouth and nose for one hour, because the fetus will be expelled shortly.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if both hands of the patient are tied up at the beginning, then you should gradually bring them to ease little by little.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	If you do not obey the instrument, then make the woman lie on a cushion and lift her off it, and then lower the cushion to the ground; and hold the woman so that she does not fall from this lowering.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the hands are not turned inside and remain tied, then cut them and extract the remains of the patient or tie the body with a cloth and extract it in such a way that it is completely removed.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	Remove the embryo from its positions on the legs.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the patient is on their legs, then you should push them upward, and subsequently turn the patient slightly, and then even out that position, and then take hold of one part and extend it little by little.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But when it is removed into the things inside, then you command him to expel it, and make that person sneeze as needed, for it will be completely removed if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not completely removed as we have recommended, then you return the patient little by little until you place them in their natural position again, for it will be completely removed at that point.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is prohibited by all that we have recommended, then take musellage of hart's flesh and dissolved gum, and pound it all in the mortar with good pounding, and then apply it to the woman's vagina, at the base of her abdomen.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And if you find that the hair is in white water, proceed until you reach the hypochondria.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the upper parts above it are inflamed, then apply a fumigation of myrtle and let that be applied to it.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the sub-fumigation has been applied for an hour, then place it on a cushion, and afterwards let her sniff something to make her sneeze and open her mouth wide, and remove that, and press the part below the belly lightly, because the stool will soon be expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Have them hold their breath and clench their muscles.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the stool is expelled according to this method, then gradually ease her muscles; and afterwards let the woman lie on her side with her head up, and her feet down, and let them be seated on the bed, and comfort her muscles.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And then gently press on the baby's belly little by little, and afterwards extract what is above the ears near the feet until it is prepared in the part above.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the stool is not expelled, then take her feet and move them with vigorous motion, and afterwards gently press what is above the hypochondria little by little until the stool can come out from above.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And then gradually ease her muscles and help the stool come out little by little, and instruct the woman to strain until the stool is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Have her hold her breath while straining latitudinally with one of her muscles.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	Here is the translation:
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if it cannot be removed, then at this time place it on the linen, and crush the substances with strong pounding, and afterwards apply dressings which I have recommended made of mucilages.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if childbirth has come, then place the child in that position, and afterwards study the reduction of the hand, and align the delivery according to its natural form, and make the woman sneeze and command her to push so that it is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	Lift the delivery upon the back expanded with its thighs and wrap the bandage around it, two below the larger part.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Let the midwife hold the hand of the delivery and then gradually turn that child little by little, so that it becomes easier.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is in place and properly aligned, then pause on the part where we have recommended applying oil and mucilages.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And then command her to bear down little by little, and when you have done this, place the child on a cloth and instruct her to lean on her right side, and then command her to push; and make her sneeze under certain conditions.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The delivery of the fetus prepared on the side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When you lift the larger part according to this method, consider it, and then you incise the second part with your fingernail so that it is evacuated of the humidity.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the delivery is suspended over the face and neck of it, then you incise that part of the abdomen, so that it is not retained and dies.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	Here is the translation:
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Outcome of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are often born at once, but some women give birth to three or four, though this is rare and difficult; however, such occurrences are due to nature, not the mother's condition.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And among those, whether they are few or many, there is a second separation by the navel string, distinguishing them entirely along the ligament at the umbilicus of each. And some women give birth to them as one fetus would be born naturally quickly, while others give birth to them separately in an undesirable manner, as we have recounted.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if some of them make childbirth difficult and they reach the state we have described regarding unnatural figures, then you should care for them as we have recounted.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife is skilled and does what she should for ease and skillfulness, whether it be promptly or gradually, and acts according to every figure as it is prepared by the birth-giver to ensure health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Recollection of what is formed in the womb from embryos and miscarriages.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some women are pregnant with one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and sometimes ten fetuses, and it has been verified that a woman may miscarry six, while another carries all of them to term, the cause of which has been determined by careful measurement of the wise scholars.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all of this must be known by the midwife because it is important to recognize the similarities and differences in such cases, and thus she can act accordingly as needed.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXXVI.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the Extraction of a Dead Fetus.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you are treating a dead fetus as we have said in the division of medication and it does not come out by itself, and you must then use an operation, at this time it is necessary to consider whether the woman is of sound constitution and is not subject to any of those accidents for which her loss is feared.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	At this time the woman should be placed on her back on the bed with her buttocks raised and her head lowered.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the minister should hold her by both hands or tie her to the bed so that her body does not extend during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you should moisten the mouth of the mother with oils and honey, and with mucus made from henna, fenugreek, and linseed.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife should anoint her hand with those oils and mucus, and then insert it gently into the mother, and then search with her hand for the place where the hooks are in the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And these are the appropriate places: then you should consider whether the fetus is positioned so that it will descend with its head down, and at this time you place the hooks in its hands, or in its neck, or in its mouth, or on its palate, or under its chin, or in its clavicle, or in the proper parts of its sides, or under its armpits.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is with its feet down, then in the navel or in the middle of its back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	Take the needle with the right hand and place its curve at that point which is between the fingers of the left hand, and insert it easily into one of those places we have mentioned until it reaches the diseased area.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And place and fix it in such a position that another needle, or a third if necessary, can be inserted equally without stretching the straightness of the tissue.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And let it be fixed in all parts so that the extraction of it may be eased as is done with the removal of teeth.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary in that place where the stretching should be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then it is necessary for the midwife to anoint some of those places with oil and insert them carefully and rotate what is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if a part of the fetus is delivered, then the needles should be moved to a place that is further along; and do this until all of the fetus is delivered.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand comes out before the other and it is not possible to reduce it due to the contraction of the tissue, then wrap a cloth around that one; and afterwards extract it until all of it is delivered, and cut it off either at the joint of the hand or at the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do the same for the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large, or if there is contraction during delivery, or if it is in the tight water bag, then insert between the fingers and cut open the head to extract the water, or use an instrument called "alundat," the form of which will be among the shapes of other instruments in the chapter that follows this one.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And it should be done as if it were a large root by nature: and now it is necessary either to cut that which is bound up or to take away that which has grown, as we have said; and then extract them from the bones with the forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the root is twisted and compressed by the furcula, then it should be split so that the moisture which is in the tissues may be released.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated and does not twist, then you should cut the root as soon as possible according to what seems best to you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the lower part of the abdomen is abscessed or is in a state of edema, then it is necessary for you to puncture that which contains the moisture that is there.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the growth is on the upper teeth, then the attraction of it is slight and the direction of it towards the mouth of the mother is also slight.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is compressed by the abdomen and the tissues, then it is necessary for you to extract that which you have wrapped in a cloth with your hand, and to cut open the abdomen and the tissues so that the fluid that is there may run out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other parts remain still and only the root returns, then place your left hand between them; but if the mouth of the mother is open, then insert your hand into the pelvis, and search for the root, and pull it along with the others into the mouth of the mother, and then insert one or two fingers, and pull it along with those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the mother is compressed by an abscess that occurs on it, then it should not be troubled further; instead, it is necessary to administer moist and fatty applications.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	Administer plasters; and follow with waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the condition is on their side, then immediately if possible puncture it; and administer the liquid that we have mentioned in the case of a live abscess.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then cut it into pieces and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And make sure that you do not leave any cause for a second occurrence.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed your entire operation, then administer what we have mentioned for the treatment of abscesses that are similar to those just discussed.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there is bleeding, then apply styptic waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman in whose abdomen there was a dead fetus, and above that focus another pregnancy occurred, and above the other focus the fetus was also dead.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to someone who had an abscess near their navel for a long time; it became internally filled with pus, and began to discharge pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat them, and treated them for a long time, but the condition did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied to them several causes of strong attraction in the form of plasters, and extracted one bone from them, and after a few days extracted another bone; and I was very surprised, as there were no bones in the abdomen.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were bones from the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Therefore, when treating the wound, remove the bones that are present in its depths and which have already been exposed for some time, and correct it with a little force.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And do not be surprised if it seems strange, for in this lies the science and assistance to what the surgeon uses his hand to administer in treatment.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments that are necessary for extracting the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of a spiral in which the main one is used:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a stretcher on which the leaves are equalized, to this equalization there are two spirals at the two extremities of two rods.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this spiral should be finer than the others, and it should be made of wire or the wood of trees.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each rod should be two fingers, and the margin on each side should be one finger, and the length of each is half a palm plus a bit more; and in the middle of the two rods there are two adjustments made of that same wood which are already fixed, whose length is half a palm plus a little more, and the width of each is two fingers or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two adjustments should be inserted into the mouth of the main one so that it can be opened by them when you revolve the two prescribed spirals.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form that is finer and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It should be made of wire or wood similar to that of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the extremity of the bone to which the addition is made as many times, and the length of each of those additions is one palm, and the width of each is two of the aforementioned.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open one of those, then you should cut the woman on the bed with her feet hanging down, because that is what is between the parts.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument as you do with scissors equally according to the quantity that you want of the size of the mouth of the membrane until the metron (measuring tool) does what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of whirlpool which the ancients described:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of that which propels, with which the deed is propelled:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of association in which the great head is contained
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it resembles forceps with teeth at the extremity as many times, and some are made long like forceps according to this form, as many times, with teeth like comb teeth in which is cut and contained.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of association for few:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form of one having a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of one having two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps in which the teeth on the closing side contain the head of the fetus:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of a spatum having two extremities in which the head is divided:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Shape of two flat spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	With those instruments such exercises are performed, and when the various types of them have been multiplied and prepared, the artisans should do so more quickly for their operation and accordingly provide them for people according to their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And you should not work with those instruments whatever they may be without preparing them, for the necessity of those is inexcusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the second [incisor].
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second [tooth] is retained during childbirth, you should command the woman to hold her breath, and then make her sneeze under certain conditions. Place your hand over her mouth and nose, and if it comes out this way, it is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then take a cloth and pierce it with a hole, and place it over the mouth of the mother along with herbs such as chamomile, rue, anise, camomilla, Arabic saffron, cinnamon, and sage.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All of these herbs or some of them should be submerged in water in the cloth, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a reed tube in the mouth of the mother, and hold it there until the vapor reaches the cavity inside the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then make her sneeze as we have said, and the second [tooth] will be quickly expelled.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this treatment is delayed and it does not come out, then command the midwife to immerse her left hand in sesame oil or masticated almonds, and then insert it into the woman's vagina and search for the second [tooth] with it. When you find it, take it out little by little. If it is attached to the mother’s flesh, then proceed as we have recommended, and when you find the second [tooth], extract it gradually so that the mother does not suffer from excessive pulling.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Take care that it is turned to the right and left with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And it should be adjusted in the amount of attraction, for it will obey and avoid adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is obstructed, we have already recommended treatment through sneezing and medication of the wound with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled by all the causes we have recommended, then be careful not to overexert in repetitive attempts at evacuation. Instead, ensure that what has been discharged from inside reaches the mouth of the mother and then apply to the woman a combination of enema and tetrapharmacon; for this will cause it to solidify within her for several days and then it will dissolve and be expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it solidifies, it rises to the head and to the stomach, causing illness; then it is necessary to administer appropriate fumigations and treatments suitable for this condition.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients already recommended fumigation with nard and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of an instrument with which the woman is fumigated due to the retention of menstruation and for her recovery:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of wood or ivory.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the narrow end should be placed in the vagina and the wider end over the fire, and the fumigation should be placed on the coals of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep it inside until the fumigation is consumed and repeat it with another one.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	On the treatment of the unopened anus of a child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born with their anuses not perforated, which must be carefully and skillfully opened.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then it should be the midwife's task to puncture that said closure with her finger; and if not, she must do so using a sharp probe, taking care not to touch the membrane.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then apply a poultice made of boiled lint and oil; and subsequently treat that area until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it may close up again, then insert a cannula for several days, and remove it when the child needs to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And it often happens that the anus becomes obstructed due to the healing of an injury or abscess; then it must be necessary to cut into that hardening, and afterwards it should be treated as we have said regarding treatment and lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	On the treatment of fistulas that occur below.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that occur in the lower part near the anus are usually hard and thick, which appear close to the anus or in the area nearby.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is one fistula or multiple.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And as that hardening becomes old and emits watery white or subtle pus, and sometimes these fistulas penetrate further.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And these penetrating ones are known by what is discharged from them during defecation and due to flatulence; and sometimes there is a bad discharge during defecation, which clearly indicates their presence.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And some of those fistulas penetrate into the space entering the bladder, and entering the urethra of the penis; and some of them penetrating into the joint of the buttock and into the root of the thigh.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in that which is known as a penetrating fistula into the anus and a non-penetrating one, it is that you place your finger inside the anus, and insert a fine probe of hair or iron into the fistula when there is no tortuosity.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is tortuosity in that one, then insert the fine probe of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or hair with your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel any of this nor proceed with the probe to find any cause of evacuation such as pus, worm, or air, as we have said, then you know that it is non-penetrating, and at that time, treat it accordingly.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the urethra of the penis, then the significance of that is it discharges urine from there and prohibits it from doing so to allow the affected area to heal.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it is penetrating into the joint of the buttock or into the bone and there is pain around the area, then the sign of that is that the probe passes through here if in the fistula there is no tortuosity leading to the bone, and there is pain around the affected area; and you will have continuous pus discharge; and medication does not help in that case, nor does it heal easily.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas, there is no complete cure, and the treatment of these is laborious and futile for many physicians, upon which such certainty rests.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	In that which is not penetrating and not ancient, healing by iron is hoped for as I will tell you, and this which I have experienced and proved.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient should lie between your thighs with their buttocks raised and their legs bent towards their stomach, and then insert a lead probe, or an iron one if it is in a tortuous fistula, until you know where the probe passes.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if you feel the patient's pain around the anus, then it is necessary for you to insert your finger into the anus.
